briefTitle: Apollo Device for Metastatic Breast Cancer (MBC)
officialTitle: Apollo Device for Fatigue in Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Metastatic breast cancer diagnosis
* Fatigue score of 4 or greater at last clinic visit

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not able to read and understand English
* Use of Beta Blockers,
* Use of medications for serious mental illness
